21027.description: Port for discovery broadcasts. You may need to open it(protocol: udp) on your firewall. Suggested default: 21027.
21027.label: Discovery port

22000.description: Port for incoming data. You may need to open it(protocol: tcp) on your firewall. Suggested default: 22000.
22000.label: Listening port

/home/syncthing/.config/syncthing.description: Choose a Share for configuration. Eg: create a Share called syncthing-config for this purpose alone.
/home/syncthing/.config/syncthing.label: Config Storage

/home/syncthing/Sync.description: Choose a Share for all incoming data. Eg: create a Share called syncthing-data for this purpose alone.
/home/syncthing/Sync.label: Data Storage
